entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight then changing to ice pellets before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Rain mixed with snow late in the evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
